page.title: 06A Home at Reen Cross
page.content: I live on a old farm house manor at Reen Cross which is a small hamlet situated near to Goonhavern. The manor is about four hundred years old and stands on the south facing hillside commanding a panoramic view of the surrounding countryside.The farmhouse is built of traditional Cornish stone and slate and has an adjoining mediaeval barn which is listed as being of historic interest.We keep a herd of Friesian cows on our a hundred and twenty acres of land. Part of the manor has been converted recently into flats to accommodate tourists who stay with us in the summer.Perranporth is nearby its beaches being only fifteen minutes walk away.
